content.en: Convex hull algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to efficiently solve problems related to convex hulls in different dimensions. These algorithms, such as FastHull, the implemented three-dimensional convex hull algorithm, and the O(|C0| log δ(C))-time algorithm, are designed to accurately calculate the convex hulls of point sets, convex polygons, and even connected orthogonal convex hulls. These algorithms aim to minimize rounding errors and improve performance, making them valuable tools for computational geometry.
content.da: Algoritmer for konvekse hylstre: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for effektivt at løse problemer relateret til konvekse hylstre i forskellige dimensioner. Disse algoritmer, såsom FastHull, den implementerede tredimensionale konvekse hylsteralgoritme, og O(|C0| log δ(C))-tidsalgoritmen, er designet til præcist at beregne konvekse hylstre af punktmængder, konvekse polygoner og endda sammenhængende ortogonale konvekse hylstre. Disse algoritmer har til formål at minimere afrundingsfejl og forbedre ydeevnen, hvilket gør dem værdifulde værktøjer for beregningsgeometri.
